pickle-testspec-subpage: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-subpage-desc}} Used while creating a link to the subpage holding the test code. This is the version used for pickle-style tests.
pickle-testspec-invoke: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-invoke-desc}} Used while invoking the module on the subpage holding the test code. This is the version used for pickle-style tests.
pickle-testcase-subpage: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-subpage-desc}} Used while creating a link to the subpage holding the test code. This is the version used for testcase-style tests.
pickle-testcase-invoke: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-invoke-desc}} Used while invoking the module on the subpage holding the test code. This is the version used for testcase-style tests.
pickle-default-subpage: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-subpage-desc}} Used while creating a link to the subpage holding the test code. This is the version used for default tests, that is the catch all.
pickle-default-invoke: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-invoke-desc}} Used while invoking the module on the subpage holding the test code. This is the version used for default tests, that is the catch all.
pickle-test-text-good:
{{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-indicator-desc|good}} A good result is one where all reported tests were ok.
{{Identical|Good}}
pickle-test-text-pending:
{{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-indicator-desc|pending}} A pending result is one where one or more reported tests were pending.
{{Identical|Pending}}
pickle-test-text-fail:
{{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-indicator-desc|failed}} A failed result is one where one or more reported tests were not ok.
{{Identical|Failing}}
pickle-test-text-missing:
{{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-indicator-desc|missing}} A missing result is one where the test page could not be found.
{{Identical|Missing}}
pickle-test-text-unknown:
{{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-indicator-desc|unknown}} An unknown result is one where the reported tests could not be parsed.
{{Identical|Unknown}}
pickle-test-text-todo-good: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-indicator-desc|good}} A good (but still pending) result is one where all reported tests marked "todo" were ok.
pickle-test-text-todo-fail: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-indicator-desc|failed}} A failed (but still pending) result is one where one or more reported tests marked "todo" were not ok.
pickle-test-text-skip-good: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-indicator-desc|good}} A good (but still pending) result is one where all reported tests marked "skip" were ok.
pickle-test-text-skip-fail: {{pickle-gloss}} {{pickle-indicator-desc|failed}} A failed (but still pending) result is one where one or more reported tests marked "skip" were not ok.
pickle-track-log-header: {{pickle-gloss}} Description used on top of Special:log when filtered on this specific log.
pickle-track-log-entry-good:
{{pickle-gloss}} This is used when the subpage exists, and the result is found to be good according to the TAP-format.

{{logentry}}
pickle-track-log-entry-todo-good:
{{pickle-gloss}} This is used when the subpage exists, and the result is found to be good according to the TAP-format, but the result is also marked as "todo".

{{logentry}}
pickle-track-log-entry-todo-fail:
{{pickle-gloss}} This is used when the subpage exists, and the result is found to be failing according to the TAP-format, but the result is also marked as "todo".

{{logentry}}
pickle-track-log-entry-skip-good:
{{pickle-gloss}} This is used when the subpage exists, and the result is found to be good according to the TAP-format, but the result is also marked as "skip".

{{logentry}}
pickle-track-log-entry-skip-fail:
{{pickle-gloss}} This is used when the subpage exists, and the result is found to be failing according to the TAP-format, but the result is also marked as "skip".

{{logentry}}
pickle-track-log-entry-fail:
{{pickle-gloss}} This is used when the subpage exists, and the result is found to be failing according to the TAP-format.

{{logentry}}
pickle-track-log-entry-exists:
{{pickle-gloss}} This is used when the subpage exists, but the result is something else than a valid TAP-format.

{{logentry}}
pickle-track-log-entry-missing:
{{pickle-gloss}} This is used when the subpage does not exists.

{{logentry}}
pickle-track-log-entry-unknown:
{{pickle-gloss}} This is used when the subpage exists, and the result can't be established in any known way.

{{logentry}}
pickle-console-title: {{pickle-gloss}} Area used for test reports. Can be empty, but will then have a message about this.
pickle-console-empty: {{pickle-gloss}} Message used to clarify that the output area is initially empty.
pickle-console-cleared: {{pickle-gloss}} Message used to clarify that the output area is cleared.
pickle-console-run:
{{pickle-gloss}} Button to initiate a run of a test case. After the completed run the report will be appended to the output area.
{{Identical|Run}}
pickle-console-clear:
{{pickle-gloss}} Button to initiate a clearing of previous test cases. After clearing the output area a message to the effect will be injected.
{{Identical|Clear}}
pickle-report-skip-no-message: {{pickle-gloss}} [Note for dev; delete entry?] Error message for non-existing message keys. Indicates a missing or wrong implementation, possibly on some kind of extension.
pickle-frame-compact-header-all-good:
{{pickle-gloss}} [Note for dev; delete entry?] Header message used for the compact layout when all contained constituents are good. Initial "ok" must be retained, but can be followed by an explanation. {{pickle-report-compact}}
{{Identical|OK}}
pickle-frame-compact-header-some-failed: {{pickle-gloss}} [Note for dev; delete entry?] Header message used for the compact layout when some contained constituents have failed. Initial "not ok" must be retained, but can be followed by an explanation. {{pickle-report-compact}}
pickle-frame-full-header: {{pickle-gloss}} [Note for dev; delete entry?] Header message used for the full layout. Initial hash (#) must be retained. {{pickle-report-full}}
pickle-frame-vivid-header: {{pickle-gloss}} [Note for dev; delete entry?] Header message used for the full layout. {{pickle-report-vivid}}
pickle-frame-no-description: {{pickle-gloss}} The string used for the frame header when the tests provides none. The string should not be on a form that can trigger an extractor.
pickle-frame-no-fixtures: {{pickle-gloss}} The tests has provided no fixtures, that is the functions containing the tests.
pickle-frame-no-tests: {{pickle-gloss}} The tests has run no tests, that is the functions for the fixtures has none.
pickle-report-frame-wrap-translated:
{{pickle-gloss}} A frame level outher wrapper for the initial keyword and its translation. This is a message where localized parenthesis can be added, other than that it should probably not be changed.
{{Optional}}
pickle-report-frame-wrap-untranslated:
{{pickle-gloss}} A frame level outher wrapper for the initial keyword when there are no translation. It should probably not be changed.
{{Optional}}
pickle-report-frame-is-ok-original:
{{pickle-gloss}} Initial keyword "ok" used for each good test at frame level in a TAP-report. This keyword should not be changed as it will make the parsing fail.
{{Notranslate}}{{Identical|OK}}
pickle-report-frame-is-not-ok-original:
{{pickle-gloss}} Initial keyword "not ok" used for each failed test at frame level in a TAP-report. This keyword should not be changed as it will make the parsing fail
{{Notranslate}}
pickle-report-frame-is-ok-translated:
{{pickle-gloss}} Translation of the initial keyword "ok" used for each good test at frame level in a TAP-report. This goes in the parenthesis like "ok (something)".
{{Optional}}{{Identical|OK}}
pickle-report-frame-is-not-ok-translated:
{{pickle-gloss}} Translation of the initial keyword "not ok" used for each good test at frame level in a TAP-report. This goes in the parenthesis like "not ok (something)".
{{Optional}}
pickle-report-frame-wrap-description: {{pickle-gloss}} An outher wrapper for the optional description string. This is a message where special markers can be added.
pickle-report-adapt-wrap-translated:
{{pickle-gloss}} An adapt level outher wrapper for the initial keyword and its translation. This is a message where localized parenthesis can be added, other than that it should probably not be changed.
{{Optional}}
pickle-report-adapt-wrap-untranslated:
{{pickle-gloss}} An adapt level outher wrapper for the initial keyword when there are no translation. It should probably not be changed.
{{Optional}}
pickle-report-adapt-is-ok-original:
{{pickle-gloss}} Initial keyword "ok" used for each good test at adapt level in a TAP-report. This keyword should not be changed as it will make the parsing fail.
{{Notranslate}}{{Identical|OK}}
pickle-report-adapt-is-not-ok-original:
{{pickle-gloss}} Initial keyword "not ok" used for each failed test at adapt level in a TAP-report. This keyword should not be changed as it will make the parsing fail
{{Notranslate}}
pickle-report-adapt-is-ok-translated:
{{pickle-gloss}} Translation of the initial keyword "ok" used for each good test at adapt level in a TAP-report. This goes in the parenthesis like "ok (something)".
{{Optional}}{{Identical|OK}}
pickle-report-adapt-is-not-ok-translated:
{{pickle-gloss}} Transkation of the initial keyword "not ok" used for each good test at adapt level in a TAP-report. This goes in the parenthesis like "not ok (something)".
{{Optional}}
pickle-report-adapt-todo-no-description:
{{pickle-gloss}} The default message when the optional description string is missing for the todo.
{{optional}}
pickle-report-adapt-skip-no-description:
{{pickle-gloss}} The default message when the optional description string is missing for the skip.
{{optional}}
pickle-report-adapt-wrap-skip:
{{pickle-gloss}} An outher wrapper for the "skip" keyword and the optional string. It can be adapted by a following localization "skip (something)", but keep the keyword "skip". There should be a single hash mark in the message, right before the keyword. Removing the initial keyword will make the parsing fail.
{{Identical|Skip}}
pickle-report-adapt-wrap-todo:
{{pickle-gloss}} An outher wrapper for the "todo" keyword and the optional string. It can be adapted by a following localization "todo (something)", but keep the keyword "todo". There should be a single hash mark in the message, right before the keyword. Removing the initial keyword will make the parsing fail.
{{Identical|Todo}}
pickle-report-adapt-wrap-description: {{pickle-gloss}} An outher wrapper for the optional description string. This is a message where special markers can be added.
pickle-report-adapt-wrap-line: {{pickle-gloss}} An outher wrapper for the collected lines.
pickle-adapt-catched-exception: {{pickle-gloss}} An exception has been catched during evaluation of a fixture. This can be due to assertions and spies, but can also be because of errors and other abrubt terminations.
pickle-adapt-catched-return: {{pickle-gloss}} A return value has beed been catched from evaluation of a fixture. This is a planned early return, and will often carry a result.
